goal: Create a Google Form to collect contact details (name, email, and mobile number)
prerequisites: User must be logged into Google

steps.expected_ui: Google Forms homepage with template gallery

steps.description: Click on 'Blank' to create a new form
Set form title to 'Contact Details Collection' and add a description
Configure the first question for 'Name' as a short answer text field
steps.expected_ui: First question field labeled 'Name' with text input type

steps.description: Add second question for 'Email' as a short answer field and set validation to email format
steps.expected_ui: Second question field labeled 'Email' with email validation

steps.description: Add third question for 'Mobile Number' as a short answer field
Preview the form to verify all fields are correct
steps.expected_ui: Form preview showing all three questions
